description: You stand on a cobblestone path leading to a large manor house. The air is warm and windless.
You stand in the foyer. A too-bright chandelier hangs from the ceiling. An archway to your left leads to the dining room. Another arch to your right leads to the Sitting Room.
You stand in the dining room. There is a door to the kitchen.
You are standing in the Sitting Room. Huh.
You stand in the Kitchen. There's an exit to the Dining Room.
